We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: HR / Admin Manager
Job Location:&nbsp;Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: Bakery

Job Summary


	The HR / Admin Officer will oversee all human resources and administrative functions of the bakery, including recruitment, employee relations, performance management, training, payroll coordination, and general office administration.
	The ideal candidate is proactive, organized, and familiar with labor laws and HR best practices in the manufacturing or FMCG sector.

	Oversee recruitment, onboarding, and staff orientation processes.
	Maintain and update employee records, attendance, and payroll data.
	Ensure compliance with labor laws and company HR policies.
	Handle staff performance evaluations and disciplinary matters.
	Coordinate staff training and capacity-building programs.
	Manage office administration, including facility maintenance and logistics.
	Support management in policy formulation and workforce planning.
	Prepare and submit periodic HR and administrative reports.


Requirements

	Minimum of 3 years of experience in HR/Admin, preferably in a production or FMCG company.
	Strong knowledge of Nigerian labor laws and HR best practices.
	Excellent interpersonal, communication, and organizational skills.
	Proficiency in MS Office and HR software tools.

Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: Bakery

	The HR / Admin Officer will oversee all human resources and administrative functions of the bakery, including recruitment, employee relations, performance management, training, payroll coordination, and general office administration.
	The ideal candidate is proactive, organized, and familiar with labor laws and HR best practices in the manufacturing or FMCG sector.


Key Responsibilities


	Oversee recruitment, onboarding, and staff orientation processes.
	Maintain and update employee records, attendance, and payroll data.
	Ensure compliance with labor laws and company HR policies.
	Handle staff performance evaluations and disciplinary matters.
	Coordinate staff training and capacity-building programs.
	Manage office administration, including facility maintenance and logistics.
	Support management in policy formulation and workforce planning.
	Prepare and submit periodic HR and administrative reports.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Human Resource Management, Business Administration, or related field.

title: Head of Risk Management Job at R & R Recruiting Services
content:
R & R Recruiting Services is a Recruitment Agency, Training, Consulting, & Human Resources Management.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Head of Risk Management

Job Location: Egbeda, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Develop and maintain the Enterprise Risk Management (ERM) Framework.
	Define and implement the Risk Appetite Statement as approved by the Board.
	Oversee credit policy, portfolio concentration limits, and loan underwriting standards.
	Monitor credit exposures, delinquency trends, and overall portfolio performance.
	Support ALCO in managing liquidity and funding risks through stress testing and scenario analysis.
	Serve as liaison for CBN risk-related examinations and ensure full compliance with regulatory requirements.
	Advise Executive Management and the Board on risk implications of strategic decisions.
	Build and promote a risk-aware culture through continuous training and communication.


Qualifications


	Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Accounting, Economics, or related field.
	Master’s degree or MBA is an advantage.
	Professional certifications (CRMA, FRM, PRM, ERM, ICAN, ACCA, CIBN) are an added advantage.


Experience Requirement:


	Minimum of 10–15 years of banking experience, with at least 5 years in a senior risk role.
	Proven track record managing multi-dimensional risk portfolios and leading cross-functional risk teams.
	Age Requirement: 35 years and above


Key Competencies / Skills:


	Strong analytical and quantitative skills.
	In-depth knowledge of CBN regulations, IFRS 9, Basel II/III, and AML/CFT frameworks.
	Excellent communication and report-writing abilities.
	Strong leadership, independence, and high professional ethics.


Salary Range
N450,000 Gross / month.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: r2recruitmentservices@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: For inquiries, send a WhatsApp message to: 09035411252.    

    

        Click here to Apply
